actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain rights in the State of Wyoming.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the record owner all right, title and interest in minerals reserved to the United States in specified lands in the State of Wyoming.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain rights in the State of Wyoming.
